title: [Arcade Miss Fortune Bug] - Love Tap sound being replaced
body:
So with the news of Arcade MF chromas coming soon I thought I would try out beloved Arcade MF again. It's better but indeed still not fixed.

As far as I could tell, this was the only problem.
> Arcade MF uses the classic auto attack sound when making auto attacks that trigger Love Tap.

Attacks on targets with Love Tap already applied used the proper Arcade AA sounds.
I could not tell if it was using the proper double "bwip bwoop" sounds for alternating Love Tap applications. Couldn't hear over the top of the classic AA sounds.
Kateykhaos, you are breaking my heart. here is the bug on this video https://youtu.be/9GuzkKp7xqs  and the real love tap sounds is this https://youtu.be/DZ1el_4RwFI?t=1m10s

replies.body:
Hey! 

I'm following up with the team today. 

The bug is logged and in the catalog, so no need to re-post the issue, although, I know you're pretty on top of tracking the status. :)

I think I'd mentioned before that this was a lower priority issue than some other bugs that have come up, but it's not closed out as a won't fix bug. With the Arcade Miss Fortune chroma pack, it looks like this is issue is gaining a bit more traction. No promises that this will get resolved for 6.17, but I'm happy to bring this up to my team today and get a pulse on the issue.

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=A9AUm4nE,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-08-16T17:17:23.789+0000)
>
> Hey! 
> 
> I'm following up with the team today. 
> 
> The bug is logged and in the catalog, so no need to re-post the issue, although, I know you're pretty on top of tracking the status. :)
> 
> I think I'd mentioned before that this was a lower priority issue than some other bugs that have come up, but it's not closed out as a won't fix bug. With the Arcade Miss Fortune chroma pack, it looks like this is issue is gaining a bit more traction. No promises that this will get resolved for 6.17, but I'm happy to bring this up to my team today and get a pulse on the issue.

HI ,  Im glad RIOT KATEYKHAOS you answer , me so if i understand they will fix it ,?? because it's about half a year they never fix it . and i'm thinking if i  should buy chroma Miss Fortune or not  because of the bug  .I just hope they will fix it for patch 6.17. i talk with frends or some ppl main Miss Fortune they say " yeah i want to buy chroma , but never mine she still have the bug sounds on here skin" could you answer me please if your team will work on it ?  . And you say it's a lower priority i know but cmon  it's not difficult to repear a little bug :(

Hey! 

So, it looks like some base SFX were being called for Love Tap. Our audio engineer swapped it out, and you should hear the proper sounds in the next patch (the one with all of the Arcade Miss Fortune chromas)! Lemme know if you're still having issues once the new patch goes out!

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=A9AUm4nE,comment-id=000000000000,timestamp=2016-08-24T23:39:29.189+0000)

Look at the link http://boards.euw.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/champions-gameplay-en/soq8id5Z-riot-kateykhaos , but im not complaining  they  not fix the bug with critic , but never mine im happy , that they fixed  , and just the sounds it's abit lower than average like the video i show you skinspotlight arcade miss fortune , coz now she shooting with the normal arcade sounds :)  , but it's not so how to say for exemple my computer  volume it's a  30 we  can hear  a bit the blipp bloop , and the video we can hear hard the bliip bloop,  
BUT TY
